page.title: 13A DAY IN ROBERT'S LIFE
page.content: At half past seven in the morning I wake up and get washed. I go in my room and make my bed then I get dressed. When I am dressed I go downstairs and have breakfast. Then I go and watch TV for a little while. I go to North Walsham rugby club to train. In the training we do pressups, throwing the ball, tackling and then we have a game. At twelve my dad collects me and we go home for lunch. Usually we have a roast and a sweet for afters. Then I might do some gardening. I wish I'd never offered. I'll do some weeding and watering for mum then I'll watch dad doing some. Then it's tea time. I'll perhaps have a salad then go and watch TV. It will be the 'A' Team or the Late Late Breakfast Show. Then I will go to bed and think of the things I will do tomorrow.
